column2: the food is terrific. I ordered the truffle egg salad sandwich on the pretzel bun - and WOW. The pretzel bun is delicious and the egg salad doesn't disappoint. You get two sides with the sandwich
column3: so I ordered the Four Beans and the Cous Cous. The Four Beans has a hint of curry and cilantro
column4: and it's very satisfying. The Cous Cous has very good flavor
column5: but I'd probably opt for something different next time (just a preference thing I guess). We didn't order any desserts
column6: but they looked terrific too - carrot cake cupcakes
